column1: #Text=Pirate captain says : " I 've never seen such a fine specimen of lemur .
#Text=" Katara says : " Look at this , Aang .
#Text=" Aang says : " Where did you get a waterbending scroll ?
#Text=" Pirate captain says : " Let 's just say I got it up North , at a most reasonable price , free .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Wait a minute ... Sea loving traders , with suspiciously acquired merchandise , and pet reptile birds ?
#Text=" Oh says : " We prefer to think of ourselves as " high risk traders . "
